ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 8 cores x 8 FP32/cycle (AVX2 256-bit) x 2 (FMA) = 128 FP32 ops/clock (single FMA unit per core)
ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 8 cores x 4 FP64/cycle (AVX2) x 2 (FMA) = 64 FP64 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 8 cores x 32 INT8/cycle (AVX2) x 2 = 512 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Calculated at boost_clock_mhz (4300 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: Zen+ architecture with AVX2 (256-bit). Single FMA unit per core (unlike Intel with 2 FMA units). No AVX-512, no native FP16.
